meanings.definition: A person who impregnates someone else.
meanings.sent1: The impregnators in the story were the ones who made the characters become parents.
meanings.sent2: The impregnators at the clinic helped many couples start families.
meanings.sent3: The impregnators at the party were jokingly called 'baby-makers' by their friends.
meanings.sent4: The impregnators of ideas can lead to great innovations in society.
meanings.sent5: The impregnators of hope spread positivity wherever they go.

meanings.definition: A substance or material that causes impregnation.
meanings.sent1: The impregnators used in the experiment helped the seeds grow faster.
meanings.sent2: The impregnators in the soil enriched it with essential nutrients.
meanings.sent3: The impregnators in the paint made the colors more vibrant.
meanings.sent4: The impregnators of flavor enhanced the taste of the dish.
meanings.sent5: The impregnators of scent filled the room with a pleasant aroma.
